name: Lucid (itch) (odd509)
description:
(PURA Game Jam 22' - OH Olsun) Louis is in a lucid dream where he has to use his imagination to reach crystal pieces and continue his way. He can draw whatever he wants to proceed inside his imagination bubble.

  • Up or W key to enter drawing mode
  • Down or S key to go back to moving mode
  • Space to jump
